name: ConnectPublish_PutConnectRetry
description:
Republishes Connect information for the  specified set of envelopes. The primary use is to republish Connect post failures by including envelope IDs for the envelopes that failed to post in the request. The list of envelope IDs that failed to post correctly can be retrieved by calling to [Connect::listEventLogs](/docs/esign-rest-api/reference/connect/connectevents/list/) retrieve the failure log.

**Note:** To use this function, you must be an account administrator and Connect must be enabled on your account.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

connectFailureFilter.description: A list of failed envelope IDs to retry.

envelopeIds.description:
An array of envelope GUIDs.

Example: `93be49ab-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-f752070d71ec`

synchronous.description: Must be **false.** Setting this property to any other value will result in errors.

connectFailureFilter.x-ms-summary: A list of failed envelope IDs to retry.

$ul: **retryQueue**: Details about a Connect failure result.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
